item.title: AT&T Is Spending Billions to Wire U.S. for Fast Internet
item.description: AT&T Invests $42.5 Billion to Wire U.S. for Fast Internet AT&T is investing $42.5 billion to expand its network of fiber-optic cables. The investment will allow AT&T to reach an additional 30 million homes and businesses over the next five years.
